basics.name: Nicolás Battaglia
basics.label: Javascript & Deno Engineer with +10 years of experience
basics.summary: I like Javascript, Deno and fast websites. I love working on small pieces of code improving performance or memory problems. I have worked in different environments: from start-ups to multinational companies. Open source collaborator. Actually learning Rust & Astro. I live in Madrid, Spain.

work.name: Denode
work.summary: Member of transports team, enabling public transportation users from Argentina to pay for trips through MODO app, using interoperable QR system.

work.name: Denode
work.summary: During my period at Denode as a Fullstack Developer, I played a key role in developing and enhancing innovative applications. My work included building and maintaining complex systems using Node.js and React, which significantly improved user experience and operational efficiency. I contributed to high-impact projects, such as a background removal app and a commercial gaming platform, demonstrating my ability to deliver robust solutions and manage full project lifecycles from conception to deployment.

work.name: Security Scorecard
work.summary: At SecurityScorecard, I served as a Senior Platform Backend Engineer for 1 year and 5 months. During my tenure, I developed a comprehensive rate limit solution that was implemented organization-wide, effectively tracking the use of various endpoints and functions across different repositories. This solution enabled us to segment access based on user type, enhancing security and efficiency. Additionally, I worked on the Cyber Risk Quantification (CRQ) product, which helps customers understand cyber risk in financial terms.

work.name: Mural
work.summary: During my one-year tenure at MURAL, I contributed as both a Core Platform Developer and a Workflows Developer. In the Core Platform team, I focused on enhancing MURAL's extensibility and integrations, making it more capable and integral to the workflow of various teams.

work.name: Spark Digital
work.summary: I led backend implementations, using node.js mainly. I co-founded the Ray Initiative, an internal project incubator aimed at fostering employee professional development through collaborative projects.

work.name: Globant
work.summary: Work for several clients such as Deloitte, using .Net technology.

projects.name: Remove Background
projects.description: Remove.bg uses artificial intelligence to automatically modify backgrounds or isolate subjects in photos.

projects.name: Mural
projects.description: Mural is a visual collaboration platform designed to enhance teamwork and creativity. It offers virtual whiteboards where teams can brainstorm, plan projects, and visualize ideas together, regardless of their physical location.

projects.name: Norton Reader
projects.description: Norton provides an interactive reading experience for students, allowing them to take notes, highlight text, and access books offline.

projects.name: Cyber Risk Quantification
projects.description: SecurityScorecard’s CxRQ capabilities help customers understand the financial impact of a cyber-attack, gain insight into the probability of incidents over time and quantify the reduction in expected losses if issues are resolved.

projects.name: Bento
projects.description: Bento is a free data visualization tool designed for education leaders to easily access, explore, and understand national and state-level survey data from teachers and principals.
